member.name: D3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Defines the dimensions of a viewport.

member.name: D3D11_VIEWPORT.TopLeftX
member.summary: X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

member.name: D3D11_VIEWPORT.TopLeftY
member.summary: Y position of the top of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.

member.name: D3D11_VIEWPORT.MinDepth
member.summary: Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

member.name: D3D11_VIEWPORT.MaxDepth
member.summary: Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.
